snippet: Roger Federer’s chance of qualifying for the ATP Tour Finals took a hit when he lost to Gaël Monfils in the third round at the Shanghai Masters.
abstract: Roger Federer’s chance of qualifying for ATP Tour Finals takes a hit when he loses to Gael Monfils in the third round at the Shanghai Masters.
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer’s chance of qualifying for the ATP Tour Finals took a hit when he lost to Gaël Monfils in the third round at the Shanghai Masters.
